Display a map of Montpellier¶

blablabla

network_montpellier.make_map.code.animation_type_transport(transport)¶

a faire la doc

network_montpellier.make_map.code.type_transport(transport)¶

This function plot on interactive map of the shortest path for different type of transport from Maison du Lez, Montpellier, France to Place to Eugène Bataillon, Montpellier, France.

transport : type of transport to choose to plot his path

an interactive map showing the shortest path
